website_summaries.verdict: This all-in-one emergency roadside kit is convenient, durable and powerful.
pros: Kit comes with a 5 ton capacity jack, a tire inflator pump, and an electric impact wrench
Capable of lifting a vehicle in under a minute
Storage box features an emergency reflective triangle and hook-and-loop tape to secure it, so it doesn't slide around
Has a built-in LED light for night emergencies
cons: it can take a while to inflate a tire
Some felt that this was more of a 3 ton capacity jack

customer_reviews.title: Save your old back!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this jack for almost a year now and I would not trade it for anything else. It has lifted my 37' fifth wheel, My cargo trailer with my side by side in it and a McCormick tractor. The impact wrench worked on all of the wheels. No you cannot set the torque on the impact but no impact is designed for that. Buy a torque wrench and check the torque when the wheel is back on. My only issue is that the air pressure gauge has never worked. Not an issue I have a tire gauge that I trust. At 65 years old changing tires is a job. This tool makes that a lot easier. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: David Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: To many problems. Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: The jack does not fit under my mercedes benz c300 2014. The wrench caused a short circuit and burn few fuses, now my cigarette plug doesnt work The plastic that covers the air pump in the jack came broken.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday was the day I needed to jack up my van. Was excited to finally have a reason to use this jack which I got for emergencies. It work for a few minutes then stopped working. Total junk. The tire inflater wasn’t even strong enough to put air into my Sprinter van’s tires to the proper required pressure. I wonder how many other people have bought this thing for an emergency who will soon discover the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Topor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your time. It will stop working when the car is raised.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. Both stopped working when I had the car raised by it. Nothing happens when I flipped the switch to go down. I have made sure it has power and the the compressor/jack switch is on jack. This is the biggest waist of money. Stick with a normal hydraulic floor jack, it’s easier in the long run
customer_reviews.author: MunkyAssassin5

customer_reviews.title: CONVENIENCE
customer_reviews.text: I have all the hand tools, wrenches, jacks. This one little box makes everything irrelevant except for deep thin sockets- 1/2"drive. IT IS A NICE COMPLETE PACKAGE Great to bring to the track if you anticipate tire changes. If you put a SNAP-ON sticker on the box it would be worth 3x the price
customer_reviews.author: Gary Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Must have kit in high heat environment. I think this should be included with every car sold
customer_reviews.text: Liked the easiness of use. This multitool ki5 makes it safer to change tires on the road, since it cuts the time for the procedure. The box is nicely done, won't move in the trunk and has an emergency reflective triangle on it.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Realty Superstar

customer_reviews.title: The impact wrench doesn't work, jack??
customer_reviews.text: I finally had to use this product. I only got as far as the wrench, wouldn't even turn a lug nut. I can hold the socket end in my hand and this product doesn't even have to torque to turn. I should have tested it when I received it in August. I expect the same failure with the jack itself. To much snow on the ground to even attempt right now. If you order this product, test immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Jack and inflator work well.  Impact wrench, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Hit or miss with Chinese products. Luckily, I can live without the impact wrench and remove and reinstall a tire using a tire iron. The gauge for the air pump is joke, so have a REAL tire gauge handy to check the tire pressure more accurately. The jack - main reason for the purchase - works well, but as with any jack, use a jack stand if you're actually going to get under the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: robk64

customer_reviews.title: Product not thought through!!!! Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I needed to Swap out my wife tires to winter tires after changing one tire the cigarette lighter adapter were you get your power stopped working fused out and I was stuck with the car in the air!!!!!!! The impact wrench is ok but when you have a lug that is super tight forget it do not buy this
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Sikaffy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but PWR cord a bit short
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this when I rotated the tires on my Mitsubishi Lancer and it worked great. My only complaint is the power cord wasn’t long enough to go from the car battery to put air in the back right tire. It occurred to me this could leave me disabled on the side of the road, had I not found this out and needed to air my tire.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Shamp

customer_reviews.title: Do not leave home without this in your vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: This compact well built 12 volt hydraulic jack does the job. It jacked up one side of my Honda Pilot and Casita travel trailer without a problem. The impact wrench is a dream. What a relief to have a compact jack to lift and a wrench to remove the lug nuts with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Hariwhit

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for saving time and energy during a flat change.
customer_reviews.text: I tested this on my Lexus when I raised it to do a repair. It lifted effortlessly. The impact wrench looks cheap, but it knocked those lugnuts loose like butter. I put the kit in my wife's car because she isn't good with those OEM jacks and lugwrenches.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I run 20 Mercedes delivery vans and I bought this to save me the grueling task of changing tires. I'm very impressed. I am amazed at the power of these items. Especially impressed with the impact wrench, which effortlessly got my very tight lugs off that would have broke my back! Only issue I have is I will have to use a block under it, as it's too short for my vans- they have a lift point that is high on the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mandala

customer_reviews.title: Trash. A lie.  Dont buy. Cant do what a 3Ton hydraulic jack can easily do.
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage wont even lift the back of my 2007 tahoe. They claim 11,000 pounds! Not even 2000 probably. I put it under the differential. And it got one tire about 1 mm off ground. The other tire still had most weight on it. This is total bs. It's super slow too. Dont buy. Dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: That wiring was backwards and light didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Can't answer any of the above questions as this unit was wired backwards, pushed up for down and down for up, and the light didn't work at all. I sent it back. For the price you would think you would at least get something that worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: jaybird0930

customer_reviews.title: It quit working properly after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I initially really liked having something so convenient. Well, when it worked it was ok, but it keeps getting stuck while the car is raised up. After you get another jack to get it out, then it will lower and work again. Not worth it if I have to have another jack to get the car down.
customer_reviews.author: Jamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great investment vs a floor jack. Way more compact.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jack after the factory scissor jack handle got all bent up. It was between this or a floor jack, this jack fits in a box that can fit easily in my tool box. Luckily I haven't had to use it on my vehicle but I have helped lift a family members car up to change the tire. It was low to the ground and I was able to lift it up. Also it had no issue lifting a GMC Yukon to change the breaks. I still haven't hit the max height but the Yukon was lifted and still had jack to go.
customer_reviews.author: Seth luman

customer_reviews.title: What most important to know is  what kind of person you're dealing with.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfectly fantastic, works exceptionally well for the intended purpose. I could not utter more words for the product, but one thing I could add up to this review is about the dealer I deal with. He's very professional, a businessman that will do everything he can to satisfy a customer.
customer_reviews.author: graco

customer_reviews.title: Life saver on dark wet nights
customer_reviews.text: Have used this twice in a couple years. When my trailer gets a flat fully loaded and is sitting low on soft ground this has saved my bacon. Never take it out of my truck
customer_reviews.author: T. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Cool handy jack
customer_reviews.text: Once you get used to how it works it is great. It does have an issue with the plastic casing coming apart if used on ground where it could sink. Try to kept it stable so it cannot move.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The main thing that attracted me to this product is the functionality, 3 devices in 1. These guys are so keen for their customers satisfaction. Not only they replaced the malfunctioning item but they compensated me for the hassle happened including the shipping return fee. So understanding and helpful. Another brand-new item on the way ... I will update my review after I try it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Khalaf aka A.K

customer_reviews.title: Very good tools.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Jack because I've got some health issues that prevent me fro lifting and pulling very hard. It is exactly as advertised. The Jack can lift my F-250 without much effort and the lug tool also works perfectly. The tools came to me in brand new condition. I'm very happy with these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wadkins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap from china
customer_reviews.text: I only used twice to lift my Porsche 911 and now it doesn't lift anymore no raising up and down no more. Not even 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: it jacks, its inflates, it shines
customer_reviews.text: it broke when my poor placement of the jack ended up with the car smashing it. although short lived, it did its job well. 10/10 would buy another
customer_reviews.author: John Blewitt

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to use it for the first time, smoke started coming out and the fuse burned out. I replaced the fuse, but it burned out again. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product- NOW JACK STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: works well, only wish came with AC cord. 10/17/2020- JACK FUNCTIONS STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.author: wb

customer_reviews.title: Auto jack
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet, but glad I was finally able to get one of these jacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tips over will damage your vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage. The base is too thin to be stable. Had my truck fall off after the jack tipped over. Massive design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Zitro

customer_reviews.title: Almost 15 minutes to top off a 25PSI >35PSI tire (305/45/22)
customer_reviews.text: As Described! (Air Pump however is extremely slow from 25PSI to 35PSI on a 305/45/22 taking almost 15 minutes, not sure it would perform on a flat tired, remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: The PC Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Handy floor jack
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, especially in tight places. I got it quickly, so worth the extra few dollars
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good for your money
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my lawn service if I happen to get a flat on a job I can connect the Jack to my battery and Jack up my mower fast and easy
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Massey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice to incase of emergency i will get one again soon
customer_reviews.author: jun soriano

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Lifts the front of my diesel great. Too much stuff in case though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Nice amd Easy / Just what you need when you need things to turn from Bad To Good
customer_reviews.author: peter houlihan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT EQUIPMENT AND WORTH ITS VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy. As being a female I feel so much more confident and comfortable to change my tire(s) or rotate them. It's truly equipment every woman should have. QUALITY PRODUCT!!! A must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA ♥️🙏🏼♥️

customer_reviews.title: Accurate--
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it says it will do. I bought for my RZR UTV in case of a flat. Rated at 5 ton. Yup lifted the front of my motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: LJmecca

customer_reviews.title: I’m satisfied with the product quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m satisfied with the product quality. All well made! The jack and wrench work as discribed. I’m a bit surprised by its small size. Everything is packed well in this small black case and it’s not that heavy so very easy to store or carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amoy

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a problem at all with this order. I'd buy again if need arises
customer_reviews.author: Muyizo

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Used the Jack once and now it doesn’t work. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy China junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and sent both back jack did not work on either
customer_reviews.author: Biffer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to have
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a tool set that could lift up my SUV. This has demonstrated to have the capacity and reliability. I'm quite surprised of how well it's worked. I'll keep you updated should anything change down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Jack
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't do reviews but I'm so impressed with this, that I have to. The item arrived quickly and no damage at all to the box like others talk about. I used this last night in the cold on a Toyota tundra and it lifted both back wheels at the same time with ease. Comes with the black carrying box to keep it all together. Item isn't heavy at all. I will be getting another for my personal vehicle as I bought this for where I work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yep, this does the  trick.
customer_reviews.text: This is has the power and the compressor to get you out of many a pickle. This will work on my autos and truck as well as my camping trailer. No problem jacking the truck up and removing the lug nuts, compressor also makes it almost a one stop shop.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Murray

product_meta.title: MarchInn 12V DC 5.0T(11000lb) Electric Hydraulic Floor Jack and Tire Inflator Pump and LED Flashlight 3 in 1 Set with Electric Impact Wrench Car Repair Tool Kit
product_meta.description:
The MarchInn 12V DC Automatic Electric Car Repair Tool Kit is worth having for emergency roadside tire change and repair.
2 sleeves with 4 size of 17mm,19mm,21mm,23mm, suitable for most of vehicle.
Cross groove saddle prevent slipping from vehicle.
Rotating threaded rod can be spin out up to 75mm, makes cross groove saddle closer to lifting point.
In case of the power has been disconnected, self-locking power structure and safety unloading knob prevent jack from falling and will not come down immediately. When re-connecting the power, jack will go on working in accordance with the instruction, or using the safety valve manually to fall.
LED lamp on jack can be used as flashlight.

Specification:
a. For Electric Jack:
Input Voltage: 12V DC
Max Current: 13A
Rated Power: 150W
Max Loading: 11000lb (5.0T)
Lifting Height Range: 6.1 in. -17.7 in. (155mm-450mm) 
Power Cord Length: 11.5 ft. (3.5m)

b. For Electric Inflator Pump:
Air Flow: 9.2 gal/min (35 L/min)
Max Pressure: 10 BAR/150 PSI
Hose Length: 25.6 in. (0.65m)

c. For Electric Impact Wrench:
Input Voltage: 12V DC
Max Current: 12A
Rated Power: 100W
Max. Torque: 340N.M
Cable Lengh: 3.5 M(11.5 Feet)

Packing List:
Combo 2 in 1 Electric Hydraulic Jack: 1 pc
Electric Impact Wrench: 1 pc
Safety Hammer: 1 pc
Plastic Tool Box: 1 pc
Double-sided lug nut sockets: 2 pcs (23mm( 7/8" ) 21mm(13/16") 19mm (3/4") 17mm( 11/16" ))
Power Cable: 1 pc 10 Feet in Length(Put inside the marchine)
Battery Clamp Connecting Cable: 1 pc
Fuses: 2 pcs
Gloves: 1 pair
Reflective safety Triangle to warn on coming Motorists
Instruciton Manual: 2 pcs (One is for jack, the other is for wrench)

Warning:
Please read this manual carefully before using.

One year warranty, and we provide free exchange and return service for quality problems.
feature_bullets: POWERFUL: Work with 12V vehicle power outlet,5.0T(11000lb) jack capacity and 340N.M powerful torque.
EFFICIENT: Lift the car in less than a minute by the jack, remove the screws by the wrench, change a tire quickly, perfect tire jack.
CONVENIENT: The design of the jack is succinct and easy to operate with compact and organized storage box.
MUTILFUCTION: Jack, pump, wrench and can meet multiple demands. Essential tool for outdoor emergency.
SAFE: The structure is stable and secure. Machine will stop working when it lifts beyond the height limit.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars137 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
